title: scary namespace + classes
description:
Now, in the last lesson, you probably saw the mess that scares most people from C#. class+namespace. It is actually prety simple. Think of a namespace as a compartment in your code. You use namespaces to organize your code, and they are basically required in c #. all you do is after writing using System;(this just makes everythig easier), write 
```
namespace NAMSPACENAME
{
}
```
Then, class. These are actually necesary. Think off the, like classes in a video game. One class has your main function. this is how all programs start and hwere they strat. this class you typically call `Program`. Then, you can create classes with diferent functions or feilds onl those classes can access, and you can creat somthing called **Objects** that can access those functions. you make a class with
```
class CLASSNAME
{
}
```
Remember, everything inside{} is indented one aditional space from eveything else in that blocks indent.

Somebody deleted our bootup classes and namespaces! Add the classes and namspaces to make hte code run.
